    Gitter Biostars

Tutorials using public Galaxy at usegalaxy.org

This tutorials cover a variety of analyses that can be performed at usegalaxy.org

Requirements

Before diving into this topic, we recommend you to have a look at:

  • Galaxy introduction

Material

Lesson Slides Hands-on Input dataset Workflows Galaxy tour
Understanding Galaxy history system
Using dataset collection
NGS data logistics
Calling variants in non-diploid systems
Calling variants in diploid systems
Calling very rare variants
Reference-based RNAseq

Galaxy instance

For these tutorials, use Galaxy instance at https://usegalaxy.org.

Maintainers

For any question related to this topic and the content, you can contact them.

Contributors

This material was contributed to by:

  • Anton Nekrutenko

The Galaxy Training Network helps researchers find online training material, and trainers in their geographic area, and helps advertise training events as well.
